Description: Out For Season (Hip) - Beal will undergo season-ending surgery on his left hip, as per ESPN's Shams Charania reports.
Out (Calf) - The Clippers listed Harden as Out on Thursday's (Dec. 18) game against the Thunder.
Out (Knee) - The Clippers said Jones Jr. to miss at least 6 weeks with sprained MCL.
Out (Knee) - The Clippers listed Niederhauser as Out on Thursday's (Dec. 18) game against the Thunder.
